column3: killer pulled pork...totally worth the wait
column4: though if you call ahead for carry-out
column5: you can bypass the line.  If you actually want to eat in the restaurant
column6: it can be kind of a pain
column7: but if you plan ahead it's manageable.  Before I went there
column8: I figured it can't be *that* great if every likes it so much
column10: and the authentic smokey (or shall I say smoquey) bbq flavor is tough to beat.   Plus
column11: their sauce is completely amazing.  Definitely check it out!
